data.title: Bengler/Geissl
data.description: Klang-/Licht STROM is a collaborative project of Ben Bengler (music, live electronics) and Thomas Geissl (light, programming), performing together as Bengler/Geissl since 2018. Itâ€™s driven by their shared vision for creating performances where the audience is in the centre of things, with sound and light unfolding around them.
